/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with lush green trees and shrubs, stretches out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, capturing the tranquility of a quiet street in a city.
